Telekom slovenije d.d.


04 Nov 2019, 20:00


Telekom Slovenije in Samsung bosta v novembru, v katerem potekajo aktivnosti na področju osveščanja o raku prostate, od vsakega prodanega mobitela Samsung Galaxy S10+ in Samsung Galaxy A70 del sredstev namenila Slovenskemu onkološkemu društvu za moške OnkoMan. Društvo OnkoMan sredstva zbira za nakup simulatorja transuretralnih operacij na sečnem mehurju in prostati, ki bo omogočil boljše in učinkovitejše endoskopsko zdravljenje bolnikov z benignim povečanjem prostate in tumorji sečnega mehurja.

Po rožnatem oktobru, ki je namenjen osveščanju proti raku dojk, je november namenjen osveščanju javnosti o zdravju in boleznih, ki prizadenejo moške. Po zadnjih podatkih za rakom prostate v Sloveniji letno zboli okoli 1.700 moških, skoraj 400 jih umre, rak prostate pa je hkrati najpogostejši rak moških.
Gregor Pirc, predsednik Slovenskega onkološkega društva za moške OnkoMan, pravi, da so moški »navzven pravi junaki in mačoti, dokler ni potrebno obiskati zdravnika. Takrat pa se pokaže naša šibkost in mehkoba. In ravno ta strah je razlog, da umiramo pogosteje kot ženske. Trden oklep in mehka notranjost sta značilnosti raka. In tak je tudi naš značaj  zunanji dejavniki nam nič ne morejo, dokler so ob nas družina in prijatelji. Ko pa ostanemo sami, se zavemo svojega strahu in mehkobe. Mehka notranjost nam ne da poguma, da se opravičimo, da priznamo svoje napake, kaj šele, da bi stopili do zdravnika. Trdna lupina naredi zgolj to, da zamudimo življenje. In ravno zato je nastalo naše društvo: da ozavestimo slovenske moške in njihove bližnje, da je pomembna preventiva in da smo tukaj za vse tiste, ki so ravnokar stopili v naše čevlje. Letos smo ob podpori Združenja urologov Slovenije pristopili k zbiranju sredstev za nakup urološkega simulatorja operacij. V izjemno čast in veselje nam je, da sta tudi Telekom Slovenije in Samsung prepoznala vrednost našega dela in pristopila k akciji.«

Zakaj Slovenija potrebuje urološki simulator?

Urološki simulator omogoča kakovostno endoskopsko zdravljenje bolnikov z benignim povečanjem prostate in tumorji sečnega mehurja. Prednost simulatorja je zmanjšanje medoperativnih zapletov (manjša izguba krvi, manj perforacij sečnega mehurja itd.) in hitrejši odpust v domačo oskrbo. Hkrati pa je prednost simulatorja v tem, da je mobilen in tako namenjen vsem slovenskim bolnišnicam za simulacijo zdravljenja bolnikov.
Mobitela Samsung Galaxy S10+ in Samsung Galaxy A70 sta pri Telekomu Slovenije v novembru na voljo kot Modri fon meseca. Ob vezavi za 24 mesecev je Samsung Galaxy A70 na voljo že od 10 evrov mesečno, Samsung Galaxy S10+ pa od 29,50 evra mesečno.
Povezave: Telekom Slovenije, OnkoMan, Modri fon novembra
text:
Telekom Slovenije d.d.


04 Nov 2019, 20:00


In November, in which prostate cancer awareness activities are underway, Telekom Slovenije and Samsung will spend a portion of their proceeds on the OnkoMan Men's Oncology Society of Slovenia for each Samsung Galaxy S10 + and Samsung Galaxy A70 cellphone sold. OnkoMan is raising funds to buy a transurethral surgery simulator for the bladder and prostate, which will allow for better and more effective endoscopic treatment of patients with benign enlargement of the prostate and bladder tumors.

After Pink October, which aims to raise awareness of breast cancer, November is intended to raise public awareness of health and illnesses affecting men. According to the latest data on prostate cancer in Slovenia, about 1,700 men get sick every year, nearly 400 die, and prostate cancer is at the same time the most common cancer in men.
Gregor Pirc, president of the Slovenian Oncological Society for Men OnkoMan, says that men are “outwardly real heroes and machetes until it is necessary to visit a doctor. That is when our weakness and softness manifest. And this fear is the reason why we die more often than women. Solid armor and a soft interior are the hallmarks of cancer. And so is our character external factors can do nothing for us as long as we have family and friends. But when we are left alone, we become aware of our fear and softness. The soft interior does not give us the courage to apologize for admitting our mistakes, let alone reaching the doctor. A hard shell does just that, we miss life. And that is why our society was created: to make Slovenian men and their loved ones aware that it is an important prevention and that we are here for all those who have just stepped into our shoes. This year, with the support of the Association of Urologists of Slovenia, we started to raise funds for the purchase of a urological simulator of operations. It is a great honor and pleasure that both Telekom Slovenije and Samsung have recognized the value of our work and joined the campaign. "

Why does Slovenia need a urological simulator?

The urological simulator provides quality endoscopic treatment for patients with benign prostatic enlargement and bladder tumors. The advantage of the simulator is the reduction of inter-operative complications (less blood loss, less bladder perforations, etc.) and faster discharge to home care. At the same time, the advantage of the simulator is that it is mobile and thus intended for all Slovenian hospitals to simulate patient treatment.
The Samsung Galaxy S10 + and Samsung Galaxy A70 are available as Telen of the Month in November at Telekom Slovenije. With a tie-in for 24 months, the Samsung Galaxy A70 is available starting at $ 10 a month, and the Samsung Galaxy S10 + starting at $ 29.50 a month.
